settings.promo_text: Description of promotion with lots of details.

settings.title: Ease Your Digestion
settings.text: If you have a dairy sensitivity, you’ll likely experience digestive upset after consuming milk, cheese, ice cream, or other dairy-heavy products. Fortunately, when you dine with Table & Twine, you can eat with confidence knowing that all dishes are 100% dairy-free.

settings.title: Clear Your Skin
settings.text: For some people, a dairy intolerance manifests in skin issues like acne and rashes. The best way to mitigate these problems is to consume a dairy-free diet. Table & Twine can help by delivering healthy, allergy friendly meals right to your door.

settings.title: Enjoy Family Meals Together Again
settings.text: From cheesy pizza to dairy-free bolognese, every Table & Twine dish only takes 15 minutes to prepare. That means every member of the family can order a dinner that satisfies their palette and dietary restrictions.

settings.section_heading: Why Choose a Dairy-Free Meal Kit?
settings.text: Our chefs want to take the drudgery out of dinnertime. That’s why they carefully source 100% dairy-free ingredients for your Charleston meal kit, providing you with an at-home culinary experience that’s indistinguishable from that of a five-star restaurant. Other benefits of Charleston dairy-free meal kits include:

Fresh, Bold Flavors: Unlike restaurant delivery, you won’t end up with soggy, lukewarm food when you partner with Table & Twine. That's because our chefs are catering experts who understand how to minimize prep time while still locking in flavors.

100% Dairy-Free Meals: Our culinary team develops each dairy-free meal to be delicious and satisfying. Even better, we carefully select 100% dairy-free ingredients so you no longer have to worry about trace amounts of cheese or milk.

Rotating Menu: At Table & Twine, we believe every meal should be fun and exciting. With this in mind, our chefs unveil a new menu each week. From chicken tagine to pork tacos, we have something for everyone.

Local, Seasonal Ingredients: We don't use ingredients that are out-of-season or that have been sitting in a crisper for six months. Instead, everything is as fresh as possible. Our constantly changing menu ensures that we can always incorporate what is in season.

settings.heading: {{ collection.metafields.custom.second_heading.value }}
settings.heading2: What To Expect From Our Dairy-Free Meal Service
settings.text2: Whether you’ve avoided dairy for years or are just now exploring a dairy-free diet, our Charleston meal kit makes it easy to eat delicious, convenient dishes that won’t compromise your health.

settings.title: Should I avoid dairy even if I don’t have an intolerance?
settings.text: Some people find that when they avoid dairy, their health improves dramatically. Daily stomach aches vanish and acne clears up. However, before you change your diet, you should always consult a doctor.

settings.title: Does dairy-free mean no eggs?
settings.text: No, dairy-free does not mean egg-free. Even though eggs are often sold in the dairy section of stores, they are not a source of dairy. Only milk and milk-based products count as dairy.

settings.title: What will I get in my Table & Twine dairy-free meal?
settings.text: Our meal kits include all of the ingredients needed to prepare a restaurant-quality dish.

settings.title: Will I benefit from a dairy-free meal kit in Charleston?
settings.text: Definitely. Planning and choosing ingredients is often the hardest part of starting a healthy eating plan. However, with our dairy-free meal prep service in Charleston, the hard part is already handled. You’ll just need to heat, garnish, and serve your delicious dairy-free dish.

settings.heading: Heating Instructions
settings.text: Preparing an allergy-friendly meal by Table & Twine is simple! Just scan the QR code on your meal’s packaging for easy-to-follow heating instructions. These instructions are also available online.
